entry.def: An ass is an animal which is related to a horse but which is smaller and has long ears.
If you describe someone as an ass, you think that they are silly or do silly things.

example.ex: He was generally disliked and regarded as a pompous ass.
example.tran: 他常不招人待见，而且被看作是个自负的大傻帽儿。

entry.tran: （通过语言或暴力）泄愤，发泄不满情绪
entry.def: To kick ass or to kick someone's ass means to show them that you are angry with them, either by telling them or by using physical force.

example.ex: They've really been kicking ass lately — busting places up, harassing everybody...
example.tran: 他们最近真是让人气不打一处来，闹得天翻地覆，搅得每个人都不得安宁。

example.ex: He damn well better not try it now or he will damn well get his ass kicked.
example.tran: 他最好不要现在就试，否则铁定会被气个半死。

entry.tran: （粗鲁地表示愤怒或异议）去你的，去死
entry.def: Saying that someone can kiss your ass is a very rude way of expressing anger or disagreement.
If you say that someone makes an ass of themselves, you mean they behave in a way that you think is very silly.

example.ex: I find no pleasure in seeing people make asses of themselves.
example.tran: 我看见人们出洋相并不幸灾乐祸。

means.word_mean: 1. the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on;

sentences.sentence: "he deserves a good kick in the butt"
"are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?"

means.word_mean: 3. hardy and sure-footed animal smaller and with longer ears than the horse

list.explanation: 穷困潦倒的，蒌靡不振的

example.en: He blew his pay pack, and he's flat on his ass.
example.zh: 他丢了饭碗，现在穷闲潦倒。

example.en: That company's a loser.flat on its ass.
example.zh: 那个连队老打败仗, 士气小振。

example.en: Whether you make it or not,it's no skin off my ass.
example.zh: 不管你做不做得成，跟我都没关系。

example.en: We better haul ass,it's a long way home.
example.zh: 咱们还是动身吧,回家的路长着呢。

list.explanation: 立即行动(尤指奉命而动)

example.en: I want it now,so haul ass!
example.zh: 这个我现在就要，你马上去办!

example.en: They were really hauling ass when they hit that curve.
example.zh: 他们到了那拐弯的地方，刷的一下把车开过去了。

list.explanation: (黑人用语)无足轻重的人，不值得重视的人

example.en: He seems like a man with a paper ass to me; don't pay him any attention.
example.zh: 在我看来，他没有什么了不起的，你不必理会他。

example.en: If you lie on the ground you will get your clothes rat-ass.
example.zh: 你要是躺在地上会弄脏衣服的。

example.en: He's always wearing the ratty rags.

list.explanation: 不能自拔，五体投地，深深地

example.en: She's so beautiful she'll knock you ass over tincups.
example.zh: 她真漂亮得可叫你神魂颠倒。

list.explanation: 非常艰苦地、千辛万苦地干(某事)

example.en: I've been busting my ass to get this thing on time. and now they don't want it.
example.zh: 我一直千辛万苦要把这按时完成，但现在他们却不要了。

example.en: l'm finished busting my nuts on that kind of work.
example.zh: 我累死累活地终于把那种活儿干完了。

list.explanation: 处境困苦，穷困潦倒，毫无希望

example.en: He lost three jobs, and now he's on his ass.
example.zh: 他失业三次，现在生活十分困苦。

example.en: His company went bankrupt, and he's on his ear now.
example.zh: 他的公司破产了，眼下他是走投无路。

example.en: I better be right this time, because my ass is on the line.
example.zh: 这一回我可不能再搞错了，我担着风险呢。

sentences.en: The donkey is a domesticated form of the African wild ass.
sentences.cn: 驴是非洲野驴的一种已驯化的品种。

jushi.english: The police have been up my ass ever since I was done for speeding.
jushi.chinese: 自从我那次超速违章以来,警察一直没让我得到安宁。

jushi.english: Don't be such ass at the meeting—standing up and then forgetting the question.
jushi.chinese: 我在会议上出了个大洋相——站起来却忘了要问的问题。

jushi.english: I worked my ass off for that promotion and I still didn't get it.
jushi.chinese: 为了晋升,我拼命地干,可至今还没得到晋升。
